jobTitle: Data Analyst - Entertainment and Media Industry Opportunity
jobDescription: DescriptionResearch Analyst  IGN Entertainment (IGN.com) is seeking a Research Analyst to work in our San Francisco, CA office.  As a part of IGNs product team, the Research Analyst (you) will help shape our decision making process through the compilation and presentation of analytical information and insights. Youll primarily be working with 1st party web analytics but will also use 2nd and 3rd party data sets to fill out your understanding and provide more accurate, nuanced insights. Youll also work closely with our product, content and sales teams to help them understand how they are tracking against their goals.  This role is suitable for those looking to get into either data science or data insight career tracks. Some travel may be required.  What does that mean for responsibilities?  Maintain and improve mechanisms to report regular, key analytics information to stakeholders.  Support internal groups with their requests for information. Teach and train internal groups on how to self-serve.  Utilize analytics, usability studies, research and qualitative feedback to provide accurate information.  Identify opportunities to make more, actionable information available to a wider audience internally.  Execute and possibly lead 1st party research studies. (Depending on experience)  Owning day to day relationships with some of our analytics vendors.  This is a service oriented role that will handle numerous internal requests every week.  Setting expectations and delivering on them is a key requirement.  What will get you in the door?  A intermediate background in various forms of data manipulation such as aggregation,  hygiene, analysis and presentation, and the various forms of math required to do so. (Recent school experience acceptable)  Experience working with Excel and Google Sheets. Bonus points for experience with R,SQL, SPSS or business intelligence applications such as Mode or Looker.  Experience working with web analytics and digital media.  Excellent written and verbal communication skills, of course, but also the ability to distill complex, nuanced insights into easily digestible formats for a wide variety of audiences.  Comfortable with public speaking and presenting your ideas to others.  Must be self-motivated, able to manage and prioritize workload and meet deadlines.  Attention to detail and a measure twice, cut once mentality.  You have a passion for games or entertainment related to the gaming audience.  Heres the good stuff about us  Youll make an impact. We reach 150MM unique users each month. Were big time, but we are a small team and were not afraid to give you real opportunities to make a difference in grand, visible ways.  Gaming is the culture here. That means its actually fun, even when were not trying. We share the same passions as our audience, and want to be here.  We value irreverence. We want you to be yourself, speak your mind, lead shenanigans, and know that nothing here is above question.  There is value in games and entertainment. Were the experts and were preparing for a future where gaming is everywhere.  Come geek out with us, but be prepared to work as hard as you play. Its serious business, after all.  Pursuant to the San Francisco Fair Chance Ordinance, we will consider for employment qualified applicants with arrest and conviction records.  About j2 Global  Founded in 1995, j2 Global (NASDAQ:JCOM) is an award winning, leading provider of Internet services through its two divisions: Business Cloud Services and Digital Media.  The Business Cloud Services Division offers Internet fax, virtual phone, hosted email, email marketing, online backup, unified communications and CRM solutions. It markets its services principally under the brand names eFax, eVoice, FuseMail, Campaigner, KeepItSafe and Onebox and operates a messaging network spanning 49 countries on six continents.  The Digital Media Division, created with j2 Cloud Services November 2012 acquisition of Ziff Davis, Inc.  Ziff Davis, Inc. is the leading digital media company specializing in the technology, gaming and men's lifestyle categories, reaching over 117 million unique visitors per month. Ziff Davis sites include Mashable.com, IGN.com, PCMag.com, AskMen.com, ComputerShopper.com, ExtremeTech.com, Geek.com, LogicBuy.com and Toolbox.com. Ziff Davis also operates NetShelter, the largest community of technology publishers dedicated to consumer electronics, computing and mobile communications. Ziff Davis B2B is a leading provider of online research to enterprise buyers and high-quality leads to IT vendors.  As of December 31, 2016, j2 Cloud Services had achieved 21 consecutive fiscal years of revenue growth. Our Culture: At j2 Global, we work in a culture of collaboration and welcome those who desire to join our growing global community. We seek enthusiastic individuals with an entrepreneurial spirit looking for an environment that rewards your best work.  J2 Global offers competitive salaries, health benefits, a 401k, and company-sponsored events. If youre seeking a dynamic work environment where you can see the direct impact of your performance, then j2 is the place for you.  J2 Global is an Equal Opportunity Employer.
